#include<stdio.h>
int reverse(int n)
{
 int temp=0,rev=0;
  while(n>0)
  {
   temp=n%10;
   rev=rev*10+temp;        
   n=n/10;
  }
  return rev;
}
     
int main()
{
    int t,n,i,temp,p;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
              scanf("%d",&n);
              for(i=n+1;;i= i+1)
              {
                           temp=i;
                          p= reverse(i);
                          
                          if(p==temp)
                          break;
              }
                          printf("%d\n",i);
              }
                          return 0;
              }
